SELECT YBI.YBI_IDX, YBI.YBI_SUBJECT, YBI.ybi_publi, YBI.YBI_NAME, to_char(YRI.YRI_RTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI') YRI_RTDATE, DECODE(to_char(YRI.YRI_REDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI'),NULL,'대여중',to_char(YRI.YRI_REDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS')) YRI_REDATE FROM YB_BOOK_INFO YBI, YB_RENTAL_INFO YRI WHERE YRI.YU_USERID= #{yu_userid} AND YBI.YBI_IDX = YRI.YBI_IDX
AND YBI.YBI_SUBJECT LIKE '% ' || #{params.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY yri_redate desc OFFSET #{params.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{params.recordSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT YBI.YBI_IDX, YBI.YBI_SUBJECT, YBI.ybi_publi, YBI.YBI_NAME, to_char(YRI.YRI_RTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') YRI_RTDATE, to_char(YRI.YRI_REDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') as YRI_REDATE FROM YB_BOOK_INFO YBI, YB_RENTAL_INFO YRI WHERE YRI.YU_USERID = #{yu_userid} AND YBI.YBI_IDX = YRI.YBI_IDX and yri.yri_redate is not null
AND YBI.YBI_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{params.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY yri_redate desc OFFSET #{params.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{params.recordSize} ROWS ONLY
